definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Cossack got off his horse, lifted the boy down, and came with him to Denisov.
sentences.chinese: 那个哥萨克把孩子抱下马，把他带到杰尼索夫跟前。

sentences.english: The following year saw Cossack victory at Batoh.
sentences.chinese: 第二年，哥萨克在巴托格取得胜利。

sentences.english: “What are you feeding that chicken?” asks the Cossack.
sentences.chinese: “你用什么喂鸡”，有一天一个哥萨克人跑来问他。

sentences.english: The Cossack was dead, the horse was still struggling.
sentences.chinese: 哥萨克兵死去了，马还在挣扎。

sentences.english: The esaul looked in the direction Denisov was pointing to.
sentences.chinese: 哥萨克一等上尉朝杰尼索夫所指的方向望去。

sentences.english: Together the Cossack Hetmanate and Tsardom of Moscow march on the Polish Republic.
sentences.chinese: 如今，哥萨克统领与沙皇一起向波兰共和国进军。

sentences.english: It was an urgent entreaty from the Cossack leader that made up his mind.
sentences.chinese: 最终是这位哥萨克领袖急切的恳求使他拿定了主意。

sentences.english: Several days later the Cossacks attacked Orenburg.
sentences.chinese: 几天之后，哥萨克们攻打奥伦堡。

sentences.english: Every superiors, when is iron-fitting ataman?
sentences.chinese: 各位高手，铁装哥萨克是什么时候的？

sentences.english: An adjutant galloped down the street, followed by a Cossack.
sentences.chinese: 一个副官带着一名哥萨克从街上急驰而过。

sentences.english: Russian Cossack dancing is followed by break-dancing and an interpretive scarf dance.
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯哥萨克舞蹈之后是霹雳舞和演绎过来的纱巾舞。

sentences.english: The Cossacks fight against Poland for their freedom.
sentences.chinese: 哥萨克为获得自由而与波兰奋战。

sentences.english: At the first minute both Denisov and the esaul darted back.
sentences.chinese: 枪响时，杰尼索夫和哥萨克一等上尉往后退了一点。

sentences.english: At the bridge he jostled against a Cossack who had lagged behind, and he galloped on.
sentences.chinese: 在桥上他碰见一个落在后面的哥萨克后，继续往前冲。

sentences.english: Or maybe you'll join the brave zaporozhian Cossacks in their rebellion? Or…
sentences.chinese: 或许你会加入勇敢的札波罗热群哥萨克的叛乱中？

sentences.english: Or maybe you'll join the brave zaporozhian Cossacks in their rebellion?Or…
sentences.chinese: 或许你会加入勇敢的札波罗热群哥萨克的叛乱中？

definition: Tsarist Russia/abbr. for 沙皇俄國|沙皇俄国[Sha1 huang2 E2 guo2]
Aleksandr Kolchak (1874-1920), Russian naval commander, head of anti-Bolshevik White forces
Chechnya, a republic in southwestern Russia/Chechen
Tartar (various northern tribes in ancient China)/Tatar (Turkic ethnic group in central Asia)
White Guard or White Movement, anti-communist troops fighting against the Bolsheviks during the Russian Civil War (1917-1922)
